name: VilgeBoudicaBattle
_source: speak;Vilge;Abominations? My children!{w} Why, you once knew what it means to be a mother.
speak;Vilge;Absolute, undying love for your offspring.{w}{br}I have heard tales of your battles, Boudica.{w}{br}You understand my position, I'm sure.
speak;Boudica;I have heard enough of your ramblings.{w}{br}You will sour this earth no longer!
